description: Stores the IDs associated with the referring providers as sent by an external organization.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RFL_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifiers for referring providers as received via Care Everywhere
